doodlejump.peli

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • doodlejump.peli.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the game logic of the program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int width, int height)
      Sets up a new game

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doGameUpdates(double delta)
      Does the following game updates: Collision checking Moving platforms Creating new platforms Checks if player dies and changes game-states Makes addition to the score when platforms move down Calls the Player move method

      • Game

        public Game(int width,
    int height)
        Sets up a new game
        Parameters:

        height - is the height of the game window

        public void pauseGame()
        Sets gamePaused to true/false

      • setDoodleDead

        public void setDoodleDead(boolean doodleDead)
        Sets the boolean doodleDead so that program knows when player is dead and acts accordingly
        Parameters:
        doodleDead -

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restarts the game. Player is set to original position, score is reset and new platforms are generated.

      • setUpdateable

        public void setUpdateable(Updateable paivitettava)

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Main game run method with a variable time loop. This is used so that game speed tries to stick to the 60 FPS on fast and slow machines.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getGamestate

        public Gamestate getGamestate()

      • setGamestate

        public void setGamestate(Gamestate gamestate)

      • doGameUpdates

        public void doGameUpdates(double delta)
        Does the following game updates: Collision checking Moving platforms Creating new platforms Checks if player dies and changes game-states Makes addition to the score when platforms move down Calls the Player move method
        Parameters:
        delta - to adjust updates for variable time

      • getPlatforms

        public java.util.List<Platform> getPlatforms()
        Returns the list of platforms

        list of platforms
